item.title: websocketd code analysis
item.author: yrong@ustc.edu (Ronyang)
item.description: websocketd is a small command-line tool that will wrap an existing command-line interface program, and allow it to be accessed via a WebSocket.

item.title: cow code analysis
item.author: yrong@ustc.edu (Ronyang)
item.description: COW is a HTTP proxy to simplify bypassing the great firewall. It tries to automatically identify blocked websites and only use parent proxy for those sites.
